languages.text: "Хороший вопрос, Вольный Торговец. Видишь ли, ты — мой инструмент. Тонкий и острый скальпель, которым я отсеку гноящийся нарыв на теле моего кабала. Я потратил немало сил, чтобы приготовиться к этому выступлению — свидетели, доносчики, соглядатаи... и небольшая договоренность, гарантирующая результат".

"A good question, Rogue Trader. You are my tool, you see. A sharp and narrow scalpel that I will use to cut away the festering boil on the body of my Kabal. I spared no effort to set up this performance: the witnesses, the spies, the agents... and a small bargain to guarantee the result."
languages.original_text: "Хороший вопрос, Вольный Торговец. Видишь ли, ты — мой инструмент. Тонкий и острый скальпель, которым я отсеку гноящийся нарыв на теле моего кабала. Я потратил немало сил, чтобы приготовиться к этому выступлению — свидетели, доносчики, соглядатаи... и небольшая договоренность, гарантирующая результат".

traits.locale_text: "A good question, Rogue Trader. You are my tool, you see. A sharp and narrow scalpel that I will use to cut away the festering boil on the body of my Kabal right in front of the most powerful of my kind. I spared no effort to set up this performance — the witnesses, the spies, the agents, they gave me the material to dissect. But you, you will become the centre of everyone's attention at the anatomical theatre. This is why I tore you out of the real world and brought to Commorragh."

"A good question, Rogue Trader. You are my tool, you see. A sharp and narrow scalpel that I will use to cut away the festering boil on the body of my Kabal right in front of the most powerful of my kind. I spared no effort to set up this performance — the witnesses, the spies, the agents, they gave me the material to dissect. But you, you will become the centre of everyone's attention at the anatomical theatre. This is why I tore you out of the real world and brought to Commorragh."

"A good question, Rogue Trader. You are my tool, you see. A sharp and narrow scalpel that I will use to cut away the festering boil on the body of my Kabal. I spared no effort to set up this performance: the witnesses, the spies, the agents... and a small bargain to guarantee the result."

languages.text: « Excellente question, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Vous êtes mon outil, voyez-vous... Un scalpel tranchant que je vais utiliser pour sectionner le furoncle qui suppure sur le corps de ma Kabale. Je n'ai rien laissé au hasard pour mettre en place cette petite performance : les témoins, les espions, les agents... et un petit arrangement pour garantir le résultat. »
languages.original_text: "A good question, Rogue Trader. You are my tool, you see. A sharp and narrow scalpel that I will use to cut away the festering boil on the body of my Kabal. I spared no effort to set up this performance: the witnesses, the spies, the agents... and a small bargain to guarantee the result."

traits.locale_text: « Excellente question, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Vous êtes mon outil, voyez-vous... Un scalpel tranchant que je vais utiliser pour sectionner le furoncle qui suppure sur le corps de ma Kabale. Je n'ai rien laissé au hasard pour mettre en place cette petite performance : les témoins, les espions, les agents... et un petit arrangement pour assurer le résultat. »

languages.text: “这是个好问题，行商浪人。如你所见，你是我的工具。你是一把锋利而尖锐的手术刀，我要用你给我的阴谋团开刀，切掉它化脓的疖子。我已经不遗余力地安排好了这场演出：证人、密探、特工……还有一点点小小的谈判，确保审判的结果不会出错。”
languages.original_text: "A good question, Rogue Trader. You are my tool, you see. A sharp and narrow scalpel that I will use to cut away the festering boil on the body of my Kabal. I spared no effort to set up this performance: the witnesses, the spies, the agents... and a small bargain to guarantee the result."

traits.locale_text: “这是个好问题，行商浪人。如你所见，你是我的工具。你是一把锋利而尖锐的手术刀，我要用你给我的阴谋团开刀，切掉它化脓的疖子。我已经不遗余力地安排好了这场演出：证人、密探、特工……还有一点点小小的安排，确保审判的结果。”

languages.text: 「いい質問だな、自由開拓者よ。お前は俺の道具なんだ。俺の陰謀団の膿み腐れした腫れ物を切り取るために使う、鋭く細いメスなんだよ。俺はこの劇を準備するために努力を惜しまなかった。目撃者、スパイ、諜報員…そして結末を確かなものにするための、ささやかな駆け引き」
languages.original_text: "A good question, Rogue Trader. You are my tool, you see. A sharp and narrow scalpel that I will use to cut away the festering boil on the body of my Kabal. I spared no effort to set up this performance: the witnesses, the spies, the agents... and a small bargain to guarantee the result."

traits.locale_text: 「いい質問だな、ローグトレーダーよ。お前は俺の道具なんだ。俺の陰謀団の膿み腐れした腫れ物を切り取るために使う、鋭く細いメスなんだよ。俺はこの劇を準備するために努力を惜しまなかった。目撃者、スパイ、諜報員…そして結末を確かなものにするための、ささいなお膳立て」

languages.text: "Das ist eine gute Frage, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ihr seid mein Werkzeug, versteht Ihr? Ein scharfes und schmales Skalpell, um den eitrigen Furunkel am Körper meiner Kabale wegzuschneiden. Ich habe keine Mühen gescheut, um alles vorzubereiten – ich habe für Zeugen, Spione und Agenten gesorgt ... und ein kleiner Handel, um den bestmöglichen Ausgang zu garantieren."
languages.original_text: "A good question, Rogue Trader. You are my tool, you see. A sharp and narrow scalpel that I will use to cut away the festering boil on the body of my Kabal. I spared no effort to set up this performance: the witnesses, the spies, the agents... and a small bargain to guarantee the result."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist eine gute Frage, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ihr seid mein Werkzeug, versteht Ihr? Ein scharfes und schmales Skalpell, um den eitrigen Furunkel am Körper meiner Kabale wegzuschneiden. Ich habe keine Mühen gescheut, um alles vorzubereiten – ich habe für Zeugen, Spione und Agenten gesorgt ... und ich habe Vorkehrungen getroffen, um den bestmöglichen Ausgang zu garantieren."

languages.text: «Buena pregunta, Comerciante Independiente. Verás, eres mi herramienta. Un bisturí fino y afilado que usaré para extirpar un purulento forúnculo que mancilla el cuerpo de mi Kábala. No he escatimado en esfuerzos para organizar este espectáculo: los testigos, los espías, los agentes... y un pequeño trato para garantizar el resultado».
languages.original_text: "A good question, Rogue Trader. You are my tool, you see. A sharp and narrow scalpel that I will use to cut away the festering boil on the body of my Kabal. I spared no effort to set up this performance: the witnesses, the spies, the agents... and a small bargain to guarantee the result."

traits.locale_text: «Buena pregunta, Comerciante Independiente. Verás, eres mi herramienta. Un bisturí fino y afilado que usaré para extirpar un purulento forúnculo que mancilla el cuerpo de mi kábala. No he escatimado en esfuerzos para organizar este espectáculo: los testigos, los espías, los agentes... y un pequeño acuerdo para garantizar el resultado».

languages.text: "Güzel soru Hür Tacir. Elimdeki gereçlerden birisin de ondan. Kabalımın vücudundaki cerahatli çıbanı kesip atmama yarayacak o keskin, ince neştersin. Bu gösteriyi hazırlamak için hiçbir efordan kaçınmadım: Tanıklar, casuslar, ajanlar ve istenilen sonucu garantileyecek küçük bir pazarlık."
languages.original_text: "A good question, Rogue Trader. You are my tool, you see. A sharp and narrow scalpel that I will use to cut away the festering boil on the body of my Kabal. I spared no effort to set up this performance: the witnesses, the spies, the agents... and a small bargain to guarantee the result."

traits.locale_text: "Güzel bir soru Hür Tacir. Sen benim elimdeki gereçlerden birisin çünkü. Kabal'ımın bedenindeki cerahatli çıbanı kesip atmama yarayacak keskin ve ince bir neşter. Bu gösteriyi hazırlamak için hiçbir efordan kaçınmadım: Tanıklar, casuslar, ajanlar ve sonucu garantilemek için küçük bir pazarlık."
